name: Invisible Friends Game [Preview]
description:
For the Invisible Friends community!

Invisible Friends Game by Kian#3451 & Matrix#0903

We worked really hard on this project and it took countless hours to complete. Please enjoy this preview!

Game Info:

This is a run and gun game and the objective is to dodge incoming bullets, defeat the enemies, and reach the end of the level. Your character can absorb 5 direct bullet hits before dying. There may be a few bugs since this is the first build but overall, it runs very well. 

ENJOY :) <33333

Controls:

W = Jump

A = Run Left

D = Run Right

Space / Left Click = Shoot

Move Cursor = Look Around / Aim
